item.title: Buddies and Books POSTPONED! Sign up for the Spring Social!

properties.property: Due to the impending storm, the Buddies and Books CafÃ© evening has been postponed. The rescheduled date is Monday, March 18, 2013 at 6:30. If you did not make a reservation and are able to attend, please see the form on the Flyers and Forms page.
